name: HumDrum (Sunshine_Error)
description:
In this short interactive story you are witnessing the daily struggles of Nikolaj, an aspiring writer, who hopes to create the next bestseller. Will he succeed? Or will he fail miserably? YOU DECIDE!

This game is rather short (can be easily completed in 10 minutes). Throughout the game you are given choices and/or have to complete mini games in order to proceed. What kind of choices you make will lead you down different paths and endings. Dialogue boxes / speech bubbles can be skipped by pressing the mouse button (for those of you who are rather impatient ). Escape key ends the game.

Enjoy! :-)
